Name: Hot Hentai
About the game: Hot Hentai - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure! The plot of it is simple - you have to find pair cards on the level. After that you will see a stunning image of the nicest game girls. Besides, such games help you to develop your view memory. Do the levels, listen to good music, enjoy the images but the most important is getting pleasure! After doing the whole levels the gallery will be opened where you will enjoy every beautiful lady from the game. KEY FEATURES: - Simple and clear gameplay. - Relaxing soundtrack. - Nice pictures. - An unforgettable experience.
